title: My Updated Post
content:
My first updated post!

This is exciting!

title: Pain
content: Enduring the pain of my bones shattering into dust and my muscles tightening to the point of exploding

title: Soul
content: What is a soul? Where do human souls go after dying?

title: Reincarnation Cycle
content: Is there such a thing as a reincarnation cycle or do our souls die as well when we die?

title: Life
content: The cycle of life. Living and dying. What is the meaning of it and is there even such a thing?

title: Problems
content: Why do we have so many problems in our lives? Is it a trial or is it just things that naturally happen?

title: Perfection
content: Why do people say we can't be perfect? Is it because we are inherently imperfect or are we just lazy to chase after an idea of perfection?

title: World
content: How long do our worlds live for? Have they seen countless civilizations like us die and repeat the same mistakes over and over again?

title: Universe
content: What does the universe mean? Is there really countless galaxies beyond us in different star systems or are we all alone in this universe?
